titleStmt.title: A trip to New-England with a character of the country and people, both English and Indians.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Ward. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
A scurrilous tract written by a London tavern keeper and pamphleteer.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
